text: Ra hamile uniharula'i, jo nikai kamjora ganinthe, tyasa bhu–bhagako purva–pascimako malika bana'idiyaum, jasama hamile barakata (kalyana) rakheka chaum ra timro palanakartako ramro vaca isra'ilako santanako hakama pura bhayo kinabhane uniharule dhairyasita kama li'e, ra phira'aunako ra usako jatika manisaharu jasale ki thula–agla karakhana mahalaharu bana'eka thi'e, sabai hamile nasta paridiyaum
